Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Inene Thina Sibanikile iNcwadi (i’Kur’ân), esele Siyicacisile ngolwazi, (yona) isisiKhokelo neNceba kubantu abakholwayo

Ingaba sele belindele inzaliseko yokugqibela yesiganeko? NgeMini inzaliseko yesiganeko ifezekiswa3, abo babengayikhathalelanga ngaphambili baza kuthi: “Inene, uMthunywa weNkosi yethu wayezile nenyaniso, ngoku ingaba bakhona na abathetheleli bethu khon’ukuze basithethelele? Okanye mhlawumbi siza kubuyiselwa emva (kubomi basemhlabeni) khon’ukuze sikwazi ukuveza izenzo ezingezizo ezo sasikade sizenza?” Inene, bona balahlekelwe yimiphefumlo yabo ukanti oko babedla ngokukuqamba kubashiyile kwemka kubo

Inene iNkosi yenu nguAllâh, Owadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu, Waza Waphakamela ngentla kweTrone. Uvelisa ubusuku bube sisigqubuthelo semini engxamayo ukubulandela, kanti (Yena Wadala) ilanga, inyanga neenkwenkwezi ziphantsi komyalelo waKhe. Inene, Yena yeyaKhe indalo nomthetho. Usikelelekile uAllâh, iNkosi yamaphakade
Bizani (Celani) eNkosini yenu ngokuzithobileyo, emfihlakalweni. Yona Ayibathandi abangabagabadeli
Kananjalo ningabenzi ubutshinga emhlabeni, emveni kokuba ucwangciswe ngendlela, Bizani kuYe ngoloyiko nethemba. Inene, inceba ka-Allâh isoloko ikufutshane kubenzi bokulungileyo

Kananjalo nguYe Othumela imimoya ukuba ibe zizandulela zeendaba ezivuyisayo, (le mimoya) ihambe phambi kweNceba yaKhe de ithwale ilifu lemvula Thina Siyiqhubele emhlabeni ofileyo Senze amanzi ehle phezu kwawo. Sivelise ngawo zonke iintlobo zeziqhamo. Kanye ngolo hlobo ke, Siya kubavusa abafileyo, khon’ukuze nikhumbule kungenjalo (nihlale) nilumkile
